info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued May 29 at 8:27PM AKDT until May 30 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks AK
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one-quarter and one mile in blowing dust. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph.
* WHERE...Delta Junction.
* WHEN...For the Blowing Dust Advisory, until 4 PM AKDT Friday. For the Wind Advisory, until 2 AM AKDT Friday.
* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result. There will be some areas of blowing dust with visibility of one mile or less, especially near and along the Richardson Highway
info.instruction:
Persons with respiratory problems should make preparations to stay indoors until conditions improve. Be ready for a sudden drop in visibility to near zero if driving along the Richardson Highway. If you encounter blowing dust or blowing sand on the roadway or see it approaching, pull off the road as far as possible and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights all the way off and keep foot off the brake pedal. Remember, 'Pull Aside, Stay Alive'.
Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

parameter.value: BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT FRIDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM AKDT FRIDAY
